armband_orange.name: Fortress Bracers
armband_orange.description: Equipment crafted for the special ops team. Highly protective and mobile.

cloth_orange.name: Fortress Armor
cloth_orange.description: Impenetrable heavy armor developed by Hykros after years of research.

pants_orange.name: Fortress Legguards
pants_orange.description: These legguards are powered to give the wearer more mobility while in the heavy fortress armor.

shoes_orange.name: Fortress Sabatons
shoes_orange.description: The sounds of these heavy boots stomping are the best deterrent.

helmet_orange.name: Fortress Helm
helmet_orange.description: A fully sealed helmet that provides defense, circulation and information handling.

glove_orange.name: Fortress Handguards
glove_orange.description: These heavy handguards are specifically designed to handle a large variety of weapons.

belt_orange.name: Fortress Belt
belt_orange.description: Contains several sensors to transmit data directly to the suit's information handling system.

shawl_orange.name: Fortress Spaulders
shawl_orange.description: The sturdy and bulletproof material provides perfect protection to the wearer's shoulders and neck.

armband_purple.name: Elite Armbands
armband_purple.description: Capable of changing coverage area based on the current situation.

armband_red.name: Titan Armbands
armband_red.description: Equipment crafted for the special ops team. Highly protective and mobile.

cloth_purple.name: Elite Combat Suit
cloth_purple.description: Standard equipment of the Hykros Special Forces. Provides excellent defense and resistance in just about any extreme circumstances.

cloth_red.name: Titan Armor
cloth_red.description: Impenetrable heavy armor developed by Hykros after years of research.

pants_purple.name: Elite Combat Leggings
pants_purple.description: Now with complex armor modules at the joints to better accommodate dangerous battles for Special Forces agents.

pants_red.name: Titan Legguards
pants_red.description: These legguards are powered to give the wearer more mobility while in the heavy fortress armor.

shoes_purple.name: Elite Combat Boots
shoes_purple.description: The new composite automatically adjusts the surface texture based on the battlefield condition.

shoes_red.name: Titan Sabatons
shoes_red.description: The sounds of these heavy boots stomping are the best deterrent.

helmet_purple.name: Elite Combat Helmet
helmet_purple.description: An advanced helmet equipped with enemy identification and aim assist.

helmet_red.name: Titan Helmet
helmet_red.description: A fully sealed helmet that provides defense, circulation and information handling.

glove_purple.name: Elite Gloves
glove_purple.description: Magnetization modules enable the wearer to attach themselves to metallic surfaces when necessary.

glove_red.name: Titan Handguards
glove_red.description: These heavy handguards are specifically designed to handle a large variety of weapons.

belt_purple.name: Elite Combat Belt
belt_purple.description: Designed with multifunctional module slots for different mission needs.

belt_red.name: Titan Belt
belt_red.description: Contains several sensors to transmit data directly to the suit's information handling system.

shawl_purple.name: Elite Shoulderguards
shawl_purple.description: Equipped with a deflection shield generator to protect the wearer's head and shoulders.

shawl_red.name: Titan Spaulders
shawl_red.description: The sturdy and bulletproof material provides perfect protection to the wearer's shoulders and neck.

armband_blue.name: Falcon Wristbands
armband_blue.description: The new alloy provides the perfect balance between weight and protection.

cloth_blue.name: Falcon Combat Suit
cloth_blue.description: The new material guarantees protection with a simplified design.

pants_blue.name: Falcon Combat Leggings
pants_blue.description: A much improved version of its predecessor, with better materials and design.

shoes_blue.name: Falcon Combat Boots
shoes_blue.description: The double shock-absorbing layers provide both comfort and durability.

helmet_blue.name: Falcon Combat Helmet
helmet_blue.description: The sturdy material protects the wearer even in heavy gunfire.

glove_blue.name: Falcon Gloves
glove_blue.description: The light polymer material doesn't take away the wearer's agility at all.

belt_blue.name: Falcon Belt
belt_blue.description: Contains a micro-sensor to monitor the wearer's vital stats.

shawl_blue.name: Falcon Shoulderguards
shawl_blue.description: An upgraded version of the vanguard spaulders that provides excellent defense.

armband_green.name: Vanguard Bracers
armband_green.description: Sacrifices a bit of mobility for better protection.

cloth_green.name: Vanguard Suit
cloth_green.description: No longer used by Hykros, but still a hot item on the black market.

pants_green.name: Vanguard Legguards
pants_green.description: The old version of Hykros's combat pants. The weakest link in the vanguard series.

shoes_green.name: Vanguard Boots
shoes_green.description: These old Hykros boots look great and do their job well.

helmet_green.name: Vanguard Helmet
helmet_green.description: A great helmet for protecting the wearer's head.

glove_green.name: Vanguard Gloves
glove_green.description: These gloves are controversial because they sacrifice mobility for protection.

belt_green.name: Vanguard Belt
belt_green.description: The buckle uses an older design that is durable but cannot be adjusted.

shawl_green.name: Vanguard Spaulders
shawl_green.description: Designed to be used in conjunction with the Vanguard Suit only, and focuses on protecting the wearer's upper arms.

armband_white.name: Explorer's Bracers
armband_white.description: These bracers are made for adventuring, so they are lighter and thinner.

cloth_white.name: Explorer's Uniform
cloth_white.description: Lightweight leather armor worn by the shelter's exploration team.

pants_white.name: Explorer's Pants
pants_white.description: Not exactly the best-looking bottom, but durable and practical.

shoes_white.name: Explorer's Boots
shoes_white.description: These heavy and sturdy boots are specifically designed for the shelter's exploration team.

glove_white.name: Explorer's Gloves
glove_white.description: Additional padding makes it easier to respond to different situations in the wild.

belt_white.name: Explorer's Belt
belt_white.description: The belt has slots for holding tools and attaching ropes while exploring.

shawl_white.name: Explorer's Shoulderpads
shawl_white.description: Provides basic protection without affecting upper body movements.

core_OS_red.name: Titan Combat Engine
core_OS_red.description: The latest creation of Hykros Equipment R&D. Provides the Executors with superior support.

core_OS_orange.name: Fortress Combat Engine
core_OS_orange.description: The newest creation from Hykros Equipment R&D. Provides the Executors with stat support.

core_OS_purple.name: Elite Combat Engine
core_OS_purple.description: Standard equipment of the Hykros Special Forces. It has helped them in many difficult tasks.

core_OS_blue.name: Falcon Combat Engine
core_OS_blue.description: A combat engine manufactured by Banges Tech. Used to be a popular piece of civilian equipment.

visor_OS_red.name: Titan Eyepiece
visor_OS_red.description: The latest creation of Hykros Equipment R&D. Provides the Executors with superior support.

visor_OS_orange.name: Fortress Tactics Eyepiece
visor_OS_orange.description: The newest creation from Hykros Equipment R&D. Provides the Executors with stat support.

visor_OS_purple.name: Elite Tactics Eyepiece
visor_OS_purple.description: Standard equipment of the Hykros Special Forces. It has helped them in many difficult tasks.

visor_OS_blue.name: Falcon Tactics Eyepiece
visor_OS_blue.description: A tactics eyepiece manufactured by Banges Tech. Used to be a popular piece of civilian equipment.

reactor_OS_red.name: Titan Microreactor
reactor_OS_red.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides outstanding support.

reactor_OS_orange.name: Fortress Microreactor
reactor_OS_orange.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides stats support.

reactor_OS_purple.name: Elite Microreactor
reactor_OS_purple.description: A microreactor equipped by District 7 Executors to fight Grayspace Entities.

reactor_OS_blue.name: Elite Microreactor
reactor_OS_blue.description: Standard for Vera surface exploration team members. Provides sufficient energy and keeps them ready for any mission.

exoskeleton_OS_red.name: Titan Exoskeleton
exoskeleton_OS_red.description: A new exoskeleton developed by District 7 R&D that provides excellent support.

exoskeleton_OS_orange.name: Fortress Exoskeleton
exoskeleton_OS_orange.description: A new exoskeleton developed by District 7 R&D that provides excellent stat support.

exoskeleton_OS_purple.name: Elite Exoskeleton
exoskeleton_OS_purple.description: An exoskeleton equipped by District 7 Executors to fight Grayspace Entities.

exoskeleton_OS_blue.name: Falcon Exoskeleton
exoskeleton_OS_blue.description: Standard for Vera surface exploration team members. Provides sufficient energy and keeps them ready for any mission.
